name: Lucky 0.08%
description:
This is an interactive story created as part of the Pixelles follow along program.
It is based on my own experience. I am one of the lucky ones who survived the ordeal. I created this game in the hopes that anyone who plays it can walk away with knowledge that could potentially save another woman's life. 

Credit:
